main event: On April 27, 1952, multiple witnesses in Pontiac, Michigan, observed a strange object in the sky described as brilliant white and circular.
interesting points: The object was reported to be approximately 200 feet in diameter and hovering about 200 feet off the ground., Witnesses included a family and several drivers on the highway, who were able to obtain written statements regarding the sighting., Observations were made using the naked eye, with additional reports made to local police and military authorities., The object appeared to change altitude rapidly and was initially seen descending at high speed., Photographs were taken but were yet to be developed at the time of the report.
witness description: a family and other drivers on the highway
